articles.author: Benj Edwards
articles.title: 35 Years of Microsoft Windows: Remembering Windows 1.0 - How-To Geek
articles.description: Microsoft released Windows 1.0 on Nov. 20, 1985. Starting as an environment that ran on top of MS-DOS, Windows became the most popular desktop operating system in the world. Let’s travel back in time, and take a look at what the original Windows 1.0 was like.
